root.name: Massive Assault Network 2
root.description: Massive Assault Network 2 (MAN2) is a Sci-Fi turn based strategy game. Due to the visuals, the game looks like a RTS. The gameplay is easy to understand, but difficult to conquer. Game Features A.I. opponents for training Fascinating 3D engine "Fancy Camera" captures the most dramatic moments Play multiple games simultaneously Find live opponents of any desired skill level 25 beautiful planets, 42 units of all types
